text: Rosalie Kunoth-Monks (1937 â€“ 26 January 2022), also known as Ngarla Kunoth, was an Australian actress, Aboriginal activist and politician.TV program script of interview with Kunoth-Monks, She was known for her lead role in the 1955 movie Jedda. She unsuccessfully ran for the Australian Senate in 2013 as a member of the First Nations Political Party. Kunoth-Monks died in Alice Springs, Northern Territory on 26 January 2022 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian activists Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Politicians from the Northern Territory
title: Rosalie Kunoth-Monks
